title: Senate report details 'ongoing mistreatment' of service members and their families living in privatized military housing - CNN
content:
1. Senate report details 'ongoing mistreatment' of service members and their families living in privatized military housing  CNN
  2. U.S. military landlord put families at risk even after fraud plea, Senate probe says  Reuters.com
  3. Military housing company accused of mistreatment in Senate panel's investigation  USA TODAY
  4. Military landlord mistreated service members even after investigation began, says Senate panel  The Hill
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A new bipartisan investigation by a Senate panel alleges one of the nation's largest military housing companies put the health and safety of military families at risk even after the housing company, Balfour Beatty Communities, pleaded guilty in December 2021 to committing fraud against the United States from 2013 to 2019.
